pullRequest.title: Remote function planning
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR introduced the concept of "remote function" into planner and generates query plan that's aware of the remote functions. Depends on #14219. Partially addresses #14053.
Ran verifier explain tests across all dcs and all tests passed.
== NO RELEASE NOTE ==

beforeCommit.message:
Explicitly not supporting external functions in lambda and join filter

We check the filter predicate in JOIN in PlanSanityChecker so we can cover
correlated IN and lateral join that are converted to JOIN with filter predicate.

afterCommit.message:

We check the filter predicate in JOIN in PlanSanityChecker so we can cover
correlated IN and lateral join that are converted to JOIN with filter predicate.

nodes.bodyText: Again. Transaction must be present when running a query. We shouldn't change the behavior of Presto only to make unit tests happy. Instead, why can't we use a session with a transaction ID in our unit tests?
Those exact setups have already been done in the constructor.

nit, for better readability of the constructed error message:
External functions in [%s] is not supported: %s
This private helper method is only used once. Just inline?

Remove redundant parenthesis:
return function -> functionManager.getFunctionMetadata ...
There is no unit test coverage for this commit. Can we add some.

nodes.bodyText: addFunctionNamespace should be good enough given it's for testing only

commit.message: Add rule to rewrite filter with remote function to project

Explicitly not supporting external functions in lambda and join filter

We check the filter predicate in JOIN in PlanSanityChecker so we can cover
correlated IN and lateral join that are converted to JOIN with filter predicate.
